scripts.install: cd ./mockdata-backend; npm i; cd ../mockdata-frontend; npm i;
scripts.start: npm run stop-pm2; npm run start-be; npm run start-fe;
scripts.stop-pm2: pm2 stop --silent server; pm2 delete --silent server;
scripts.start-fe: cd ./mockdata-frontend; ng build --prod; pm2 start server.js;
